channel.title: Blog on Metalheadviking
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Metalheadviking

item.title: Light on the road
item.description: I fell in Love with this kind of Photography. It opens so many new opportunities and in my Opinion it’s really beautiful.

item.title: Bulb
item.description: This Lake is beside the village I live and is always beautiful to visit. Now I wanted to capture it by Night, which seemed like the perfect evening for this. The Clouds and the Atmosphere in general were great for a “BULB” Exposure (Exposure over 30 seconds) and also to watch with my own eyes.

item.title: Waterfall
item.description: The rainy weather gives this Photo the special Atmosphere

item.title: Magical lights
item.description: Magical Atmosphere with Starlight and moving Cars
